gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Arctic Sea Ice Freeboard and Thickness

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: National Snow and Ice Data Center

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set provides measurements of sea ice freeboard and sea ice thickness for the Arctic region. The data were derived from measurements made by from the Ice, Cloud, and land Elevation Satellite (ICESat) Geoscience Laser Altimeter System (GLAS) instrument, the Special Sensor Microwave/Imager (SSM/I), and climatologies of snow and drift of ice.

gmi:description.gco:CharacterString: ICESat provides global measurements of polar ice sheet elevation to discern changes in ice volume (mass balance) over time
